channel.title: SIR model on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in SIR model on Some Title

item.title: Implemented SIR model, a mathematical model for infectious diseases in OpenModelica (reflects mortality rate and reinfection rate)
item.description: # Add mortality and reinfection rates to the basic SIR model Mortality rate and reinfection of the class cl_SIRbetaInput created in the previous article, “Implement the mathematical model of infectious disease “SIR model” with OpenModelica” (https://qiita.com/nobby-n/items/48803407f67f62b2c8f9)" Let’s create a full version with a percentage added. *Corrected because we found an error in the mortality formula in the first post. (Corrected on May 13, 2020) Revised again. Prerequisites for this model
